text: Dance Moms was a reality television show in the United States. It was about the training and careers of children (aged 6 to 13) in the dance industry. They were taught by Abby Lee Miller, who was often very strict and would argue with the parents of the dancers. The show ran from 2011 to 2019. It made several participants into celebrities including presenter Abby Lee Miller and participants Maddie Ziegler and JoJo Siwa.Nia,Chole,Page,Brooke. Category:American reality television series
title: Dance Moms
